The only reason I am commenting is because I finally figured out why Dr. Cox was bald. Although we probably all realized it at the same time this week Dr. Cox is bald because he has Raynaud's syndrome. If you look carefully every time he is disgusted, his hands become blanch and purple. It's a sign of Raynaud's syndrome and although I cannot confirm it, many sufferers became bald due to stress.
